chapters.title: Prologue: Snow
chapters.info: Eben Hopwil, p. 68 (65)—One of the Asha'man. He is about sixteen years old, and skinny. He has a big nose and ears to match. Since he was placed on Taim's Traitors' List, he has been in hiding—he did not assist in the attack on Rand, but Rand thinks it better to be safe than to have him killed.
